params._cUSD: Address of cUSD token on Celo
params._configId: Verification configuration ID for Self Protocol
params._hubV2: Address of Self Protocol Hub V2

params._contributionAmount: Amount each member contributes per cycle (in cUSD wei)
params._cycleDuration: Duration of each cycle in seconds
params._maxMembers: Maximum number of members allowed in the pool

returns.pool: Address of the newly created pool

getActivePools().details: Get active pools (pools that are still running) Note: This can be gas-intensive for many pools, use with pagination in production

getConfigId(bytes32,bytes32,bytes).details: Get verification configuration ID for Self Protocol This is called by SelfVerificationRoot during proof verification

getTotalPools().details: Get total number of pools created

getUserPools(address).details: Get pools created by a specific user

manualVerify(address).details: For MVP: Manual verification (in production, use real Self Protocol) This allows testing without requiring real passport scans

updateConfigId(bytes32).details: Update verification configuration ID (only owner/admin can call) For MVP, anyone can update. In production, add access control.
